tooltip: Select Queen Arborachnid as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Queen Arborachnid focuses on massive huge swarms.
Allows you to summon Queen Arborachnid, a Creature with multiple ranged attacks.
Allows you to summon Mite Keepers, creatures that fling autonomous Mites at their targets.
There is now a chance that an enemy unit will spawn a Gohma Mite when killed.
Gohma of Medium or larger sizes (except Carriers and Heroes) gain a chance to spawn Gohma Mites on death.
